Topic.Title: 14 years and it finally happened ...learn what happened to E-Tub...

Message.Msg: The industry needs to consolidate but they are all holding tight. I am starting to think it will not happen. ETFC may hit the $7.01 after this qtr disasterous earnings, as expected by analyst. I agree that this should be the bottom as the regulators should allow funds to be released this year. This should be substantial event and change the dynamics for this low market cap company.

Message.Title: When I think of the friendless liberal freaks wo commit so many atrocities
Message.Msg: I think of hohobo-jbmaria. Isn't it time to start rounding up the freaks?

Message.Title: there is no evidence that tax cuts produce economic growth
Message.Msg: (the blind faith gop says just do more bush tax cuts and let the magic work.... and nevermind that the decade since those tax cuts has been one of the worst in USA history and there no evidence that tax cuts are correlated with economic growth and so says the non-partisan Congressional Research Service..........) "The results of the analysis suggest that changes over the past 65 years in the top marginal tax rate and the top capital gains tax rate do not appear correlated with economic growth. The reduction in the top tax rates appears to be uncorrelated with saving, investment, and productivity growth. The top tax rates appear to have little or no relation to the size of the economic pie." from Taxes and the Economy: An Economic Analysis of the Top Tax Rates Since 1945 Congressional Research Service

Message.Title: no evidence that tax cuts produce economic growth
Message.Msg: "The results of the analysis suggest that changes over the past 65 years in the top marginal tax rate and the top capital gains tax rate do not appear correlated with economic growth. The reduction in the top tax rates appears to be uncorrelated with saving, investment, and productivity growth. The top tax rates appear to have little or no relation to the size of the economic pie." from Taxes and the Economy: An Economic Analysis of the Top Tax Rates Since 1945 Congressional Research Service
